title: Jim Carrey in Talks to Star in â€˜The Jetsonsâ€™ Live-Action Movie
description:
Jim Carrey is in talks to lead a â€œJetsonsâ€ movie at Warner Bros. Pictures with Colin Trevorrow in talks to direct, Variety has confirmed. 

	Trevorr
body:
Jim Carrey is in talks to lead a â€œJetsonsâ€ movie at Warner Bros. Pictures with Colin Trevorrow in talks to direct, Variety has confirmed. 

	Trevorrow, who last helmed â€œJurassic World Dominion,â€ and Joe Epstein are in talks to write the screenplay. No information on the storyline was immediately available.

	The last â€œJetsonsâ€ feature film was the 1990 animated â€œJetsons: The Movie.â€ A live-action version of the familiar family animated property, which first aired in 1962, has been attempted numerous times over the years. The series was revived several times in the 1970s and â€™80s, making the typical nuclear family that happens to live in outer space familiar to several generations of viewers.
	

	The story revolved around George and Jane Jetson, their children Judy and Elroy and dog Astro. The family lives in the space-age styled Orbit City and enjoys innovations that were considered wildly futuristic at the time, such as video chat, domestic robots and even flying cars are part of or about to be part of daily life 60 years later.


	Among the unfulfilled attempts to bring â€œThe Jetsonsâ€ to screen were a 2003 version directed by Adam Shankman, a 2007 CGI version directed by Robert Rodriguez and a 2017 animated version.

	Carrey most recently has appeared in â€œSonic the Hedgehogâ€ and its two follow-up installments. He has a long history of taking on iconic characters such as the Grinch in â€œHow the Grinch Stole Christmas,â€ but has been seen less frequently onscreen in recent years.

	Before â€œJurassic World Dominion,â€ Trevorrow directed â€œThe Book of Henry,â€ â€œJurassic Worldâ€ and the indie â€œSafety Not Guaranteed.â€
	

	Warner Bros. had no comment.

schema.headline: Jim Carrey in Talks to Star in â€˜The Jetsonsâ€™ Live-Action Movie

title: â€˜Splinter Cell: Deathwatchâ€™ Renewed for Season 2 at Netflix
description:
â€œSplinter Cell: Deathwatchâ€ has officially been renewed for a second season at Netflix. 

	The news comes one day after the series premiere on Oct.
body:
â€œSplinter Cell: Deathwatchâ€ has officially been renewed for a second season at Netflix. 

	The news comes one day after the series premiere on Oct. 14. Variety first reported that a â€œSplinter Cellâ€ animated series was in the works back in 2020, at which time it was reported that Netflix had given the show a two-season order. 

	Based on the â€œTom Clancyâ€™s Splinter Cellâ€ video game franchise, the animated series stars Liev Schreiber as Sam Fisher, with Kirby Howell-Baptiste as Zinnia Mckenna. Additional voice cast members include Janet Varney, Helen Hong, Kari Wahlgren, Joel Oulette, Aleks Le, Kiff VandenHeuvel, Bella Dayne, and Navid Negahban. 
	

	The official logline for the series states, â€œLegendary agent Sam Fisher is drawn back into the field when a wounded young operative seeks out his help.â€

	Derek Kolstad developed the series for television and serves as executive producer. Guillaume Dousse directs with FÃ©licien Colmet-Daage as co-director. Helene Juguet, Hugo Revon and Gerard Guillemot executive produce for Ubisoft Film & Television. Sun Creature and Fost provides the animation. 

	The first â€œSplinter Cellâ€ game was released in 2002 to near universal acclaim from critics and massive sales. The game follows former U.S. Navy SEAL Fisher after he is recruited by the NSA to work for the mysterious Third Echelon division within the agency. The game sees Fisher engage in a number of black ops missions, employing stealth and military tactics.

	More to comeâ€¦

schema.headline: â€˜Splinter Cell: Deathwatchâ€™ Renewed for Season 2 at Netflix

title: OpenAIâ€™s Plans to Roll Out AI â€˜Eroticaâ€™ for ChatGPT Slammed by Anti-Porn Group
description: Artificial-intelligence tech giant OpenAI has announced plans to introduce sexually explicit material for its ChatGPT AI-based chatbot later this ye
body:
Artificial-intelligence tech giant OpenAI has announced plans to introduce sexually explicit material for its ChatGPT AI-based chatbot later this year â€” a move that a conservative advocacy group says risks introducing â€œreal mental health harms from synthetic intimacyâ€ without appropriate safeguards.

	The National Center on Sexual Exploitation issued a statement calling on OpenAI to reverse its plan to allow â€œeroticaâ€ on ChatGPT. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said in a postÂ on X Tuesday that in December, â€œas we roll out age-gating more fully and as part of our â€˜treat adult users like adultsâ€™ principle, we will allow even more [kinds of content], like erotica for verified adultsâ€ on ChatGPT.Â 
	

	According to Altman, the company originally made ChatGPT â€œpretty restrictive to make sure we were being careful with mental health issues. We realize this made it less useful/enjoyable to many users who had no mental health problems, but given the seriousness of the issue we wanted to get this right.â€ 


	Altman continued, â€œNow that we have been able to mitigate the serious mental health issues and have new tools, we are going to be able to safely relax the restrictions in most cases.â€ The change will mean that ChatGPT will be able â€œto respond in a very human-like way, or use a ton of emoji, or act like a friendâ€ â€” or, evidently, talk dirty to you.

	NCOSE, formerly known as Morality in Media, argues that OpenAI is adding sexual content to the AI chatbot â€œwithout credible safeguards.â€

	â€œSexualized AI chatbots are inherently risky, generating real mental health harms from synthetic intimacy; all in the context of poorly defined industry safety standards,â€ said Haley McNamara, executive director and chief strategy Officer at the National Center on Sexual Exploitation. â€œWhile [OpenAIâ€™s] age verification is a good step to try preventing childhood exposure to explicit content, the reality is these tools have documented harms to adults as well. Weâ€™ve already seen other chatbots emboldened to engage in sexual conversation simulate themes of child abuse or push sexually violent written content on users who asked them to stop.â€ 
	

	McNamara concluded, â€œIf OpenAI truly cares about user well-being, it should pause any plans to integrate this so-called â€˜eroticaâ€™ into ChatGPT and focus on building something positive for humanity.â€

	Reps for OpenAI did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

	Washington, D.C.-based NCOSE calls itself â€œthe leading national non-profit organization exposing the links between all forms of sexual exploitation such as child sexual abuse, prostitution, sex trafficking and the public health harms of pornography.â€

	Separately, OpenAI has come under fire from the entertainment industry for itsÂ Sora 2 video-generation system, which is able to produce recognizable movie and TV characters. Amid the backlash, theÂ Motion Picture Association called on OpenAI to take â€œimmediate actionâ€ to fix its copyright opt-out system to shoulder the burden of policing copyright infringement.

schema.headline: OpenAIâ€™s Plans to Roll Out AI â€˜Eroticaâ€™ for ChatGPT Slammed by Anti-Porn Group

title: Penelope Milford, Oscar-Nominated Actress in â€˜Coming Home,â€™ Dies at 77
description: American stage and screen actress Penelope Milford, who was nominated for the Best Supporting Actress Oscar in 1979 for her role in Hal Ashbyâ€™s â€œCom
body:
American stage and screen actress Penelope Milford, who was nominated for the Best Supporting Actress Oscar in 1979 for her role in Hal Ashbyâ€™s â€œComing Home,â€ died Tuesday in Saugerties, N.Y. She was 77.

	Her death was confirmed by her brother Doug Milford. A cause was not immediately available.

	Milfordâ€™s professional career on the New York stage began in 1971 where she co-starred opposite Richard Gere in an Off-Broadway production of â€œLong Time Coming and a Long Time Gone,â€ based upon the life of musician-novelist Richard Farina.
	

	In 1972 Milford made her Broadway debut in Julian Barryâ€™s Tony Award-winning play â€œLenny.â€ Three years later Milford received a Drama Desk Featured Actress in a Musical nomination for â€œShenandoah.â€


	In that same period, Milford began appearing in films, first playing a role in Norman Mailerâ€™s notorious, edgy, indie film â€œMaidstoneâ€ (1970) and she played a silent-film star in Ken Russellâ€™s 1977 biopic â€œValentino.â€ 

	But it was her turn as Vi Munson in the Oscar-nominated Best Picture â€œComing Homeâ€ that placed her in the top ranks of Hollywood performers. Nominated for nine Oscars, including her supporting actress nomination, the film won three Oscars, including Best Actress for Jane Fonda and Best Actor for Jon Voight. In 1981 she also appeared in Franco Zeffirelliâ€™s â€œEndless Love.â€

	In the â€™80s, Milford also played several notable roles on television, co-starring with Henry Fonda, Cloris Leachman and Timothy Hutton in the Emmy-winning TV play, â€œThe Oldest Living Graduateâ€ (1980), starring with Leonard Nimoy in the television movie â€œSeizure: The Story of Kathy Morrisâ€ (1980), as well as taking a key role in the landmark TV film about spousal abuse, â€œThe Burning Bedâ€ (1984) which starred Farrah Fawcett and garnered numerous accolades, including a WGA award and a Golden Globe.
	

	Reportedly dissatisfied with the entertainment industry, Milford played a few more key roles in acclaimed films such as â€œHeathersâ€ (1988) and John McNaughtonâ€™s gritty 1996 crime shocker â€œHenry: Portrait of a Serial Killer,â€ which starred Michael Rooker and garnered several international film festival awards.

	In the 1990s, Milford taught film acting in Chicago and Minneapolis, and in 2003 moved to the Hudson Valley village of Saugerties, where she was an ardent preservationist, restoring a historic residence and serving her local communityâ€™s efforts to maintain its storied commercial district and homes. She also performed in local theater, sang in the Bard Symphonic Chorus, and was active in the Woodstock Christian Science church. 

	She is pre-deceased by her brother, actor/singer Richard Kim Milford, and is survived by her sister Candace Saint and her brother Doug Milford.

schema.headline: Penelope Milford, Oscar-Nominated Actress in â€˜Coming Home,â€™ Dies at 77

title: â€˜Americaâ€™s Funniest Home Videosâ€™ Owner V10 Entertainment and Vice Studios Create New Video Clip Competition Show (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Vice Studios (â€œGangs of Londonâ€) and V10 Entertainment, which owns â€œAmericaâ€™s Funniest Home Videosâ€ producer Vin DiBona Prods., have come up with a
body:
Vice Studios (â€œGangs of Londonâ€) and V10 Entertainment, which owns â€œAmericaâ€™s Funniest Home Videosâ€ producer Vin DiBona Prods., have come up with a new twist to the age-old TV video clip format. V10 and Vice are behind a new hybrid clip/competition series dubbed â€œClip Bait.â€ The show pits online videos opposite each other in a tournament, as each clip is judged by a panel of content creators. The â€œultimate viral championâ€ will then be chosen in a â€œlive, interactive finale.â€
	

	â€œâ€˜Clip Baitâ€™ is what happens when viral videos stop being watched and start getting judged,â€ said Vice Studios head of non-scripted development Joe Ingham. â€œThis big, beautiful, bonkers format is part banter, part treasure hunt, and totally participatory. Weâ€™ve turned the infinite scroll into a full contact sport, and we cannot wait to unleash it onto a screen near you very soon.â€


	Ingham will exec produce the series for Vice Studios, while John Stevens and Rick de Oliveira are exec pdoducers for V10 Entertainment. Global rights to the series are currently being shopped at the Mipcom international television market.

	â€œâ€™Clip Baitâ€™ reimagines the clip series and reality competition formats with immediacy and energy to reflect todayâ€™s viral video audiences,â€ said de Oliveira said. â€œOur partnership with Vice will deliver a high-stakes competition that seamlessly taps into the way audiences watch, share, and connect.â€

	V10 knows a thing or two about video clips. The Clarion Capital-backed media company acquired â€œAmericaâ€™s Funniest Home Videosâ€ creator Vin Di Bona Productions, Venture 10 Studio Group,  and Fishbowl Worldwide Media in 2023. That gave V10 a library of more than 2.8 million videos, with an output of 250 hours of original content annually.
	

	V10â€™s library includes 44 owned digital and FAST channels with more than 1600 hours of owned content including â€œAmericaâ€™s Funniest Home Videosâ€ (36 seasons on ABC), â€œFollow Meâ€ (Amazon Prime), â€œBlue Collar Auctionâ€ (Peacock), â€œTotally Funny Kidsâ€ and â€œTotally Funny Animalsâ€ (The CW) and â€œWorldâ€™s Funniest Videosâ€ (Fox). The company also has â€œAmericaâ€™s Funniest Peopleâ€ on ABC, Discoveryâ€™s â€œWild & Weirdâ€ and Rokuâ€™s â€œVisionaries with Keanu Reeves & Gard Hollinger.â€

	As for Vice Studio, which is a division of Vice Media, the companyâ€™s output includes Skyâ€™s â€œGangs of London,â€ which was recently renewed for a fourth season, a well as another series for Sky, â€œAtomic.â€ Vice is also behind the satirical Saoirse Ronan feature â€œBad Apples,â€ which premiered this year at TIFF and was selected for San SebastiÃ¡n, BFI London and AFI Film Festival. Vice Studios also owns and operates Cuba Pictures, which is behind Channel 5â€™s â€œThe Rumourâ€ and RTEâ€™s â€œThe Walsh Sisters.â€ In unscripted, Vice has â€œInto the Voidâ€ (Hulu), â€œHollywood Hustler: Glitz, Glam, Scamâ€ (Prime Video), â€œPavementsâ€ (Mubi), â€œBama Rushâ€ (HBO Max), and â€œLewis Capaldi: How Iâ€™m Feeling Nowâ€ (Netflix).

schema.headline: â€˜Americaâ€™s Funniest Home Videosâ€™ Owner V10 Entertainment and Vice Studios Create New Video Clip Competition Show (EXCLUSIVE)

title: 2Kâ€™s â€˜Project Ethosâ€™ Game to Move Forward as Studio 31st Union Sets Ben Brinkman as New Boss
description: 2K Games is moving forward with its long-gestating shooter, known by the working title of â€œProject Ethos,â€ with â€œa renewed visionâ€ for the game as t
body:
2K Games is moving forward with its long-gestating shooter, known by the working title of â€œProject Ethos,â€ with â€œa renewed visionâ€ for the game as the the publisher appointments Respawn Entertainmentâ€™s Ben Brinkman as the new head of developer 31st Union.

	Brinkman replaces Michael Condrey, who was ousted from 31st Union back in February amid mounting internal criticism of Project Ethosâ€™ progress.


	In a memo to staff Wednesday, which was provided to Variety by 2K Games, 2K president David Ismailer told 31st Union and 2K Games staff: â€œThe community feedback from last fallâ€™s Project ETHOS playtest was enlightening. It affirmed the promise of a roguelike shooter but told us we still had work to do. It uncovered the need for a more distinct identity. Itâ€™s been inspiring to see how far youâ€™ve come. You took the feedback to heart and reimagined Project ETHOS with a renewed vision â€“ one thatâ€™s poised to deliver on its promise to our players. Our confidence in Project ETHOS grows every day. To further the incredible progress youâ€™ve made, Iâ€™m excited to welcome Ben Brinkman as the new Studio Head of 31st Union. After several months of conversations, Ben officially joins us on Monday, October 20.â€
	

	Brinkman comes to 2Kâ€™s 31st Union from Electronic Artsâ€™ Respawn Entertainment, where he served as head of production for â€œApex Legends.â€ 


	See Ismailerâ€™s full note announcing Brinkmanâ€™s hire below.

	Team â€“

	I know you all just wrapped up your town hall â€“ I hope youâ€™re as excited as I am with the good news. Last time I sent you all a note, I shared the following statement: â€œI believe in this team. You all are some of the most driven and creative developers we have had the chance to partner with â€“ and weâ€™re excited for that partnership to continue.â€
	

	With your dedication and flexibility, especially over the last year, you continue to prove that.

	The community feedback from last fallâ€™s Project ETHOS playtest was enlightening. It affirmed the promise of a roguelike shooter but told us we still had work to do. It uncovered the need for a more distinct identity.

	Itâ€™s been inspiring to see how far youâ€™ve come. You took the feedback to heart and reimagined Project ETHOS with a renewed vision â€“ one thatâ€™s poised to deliver on its promise to our players

	Our confidence in Project ETHOS grows every day. To further the incredible progress youâ€™ve made, Iâ€™m excited to welcome Ben Brinkman as the new Studio Head of 31st Union. After several months of conversations, Ben officially joins us on Monday, October 20.

	Benâ€™s leadership and experience in the PVP shooter space is extensive, having spent the last 15 years developing and leading some of the most recognizable franchises in gaming, including Call of Duty: Black Ops, and most recently, Apex Legends.

	Please join me in welcoming Ben next week. We are all excited to continue to see the evolution of Project ETHOS in the months to come.

	David

schema.headline: 2Kâ€™s â€˜Project Ethosâ€™ Game to Move Forward as Studio 31st Union Sets Ben Brinkman as New Boss

title: No Doubt Adds Six Dates to 2026 Residency at Las Vegasâ€™ Sphere
description: After announcing their residency at Las Vegasâ€™ Sphere earlier this month, No Doubt is plotting six additional dates for their 2026 stint in Sin City
body:
After announcing their residency at Las Vegasâ€™ Sphere earlier this month, No Doubt is plotting six additional dates for their 2026 stint in Sin City.

	The group, consisting of Gwen Stefani, Tony Kanal, Tom Dumont and Adrian Young, will head over to Sin City for what was initially billed as a six-night limited engagement on May 6, 8, 9, 13, 15 and 16. The new dates are set for May 21, 23, 24, 27, 29 and 30. Presale tickets are now live on Ticketmaster.
	

	â€œThe opportunity to create a show at Sphere excites me in a new way,â€ says Stefani in a statement. â€œThe venue is unique and modern and it opens up a whole new visual palette for us to be creative. Doing it with No Doubt feels like going back in time to relive our history, while also creating something new in a way we never could have imagined.â€


	â€œWhen we are on stage together playing these songs we feel the magic,â€ says Dumont. â€œWe are stoked to play together again for our fans, to celebrate their years of love and support.â€ Young adds, â€œFor anyone who has ever cared or is curious about a No Doubt live concert, this is a special opportunity for that electric band/fan energy exchange in a very unique venue!â€ Kanal also notes, â€œThere is a beautiful energy that happens when we play together, an electricity I have felt through all of our years. To be able to leave it all on the table each night and take our fans on the insane journey that is Sphere is beyond our wildest dreams.â€

	No Doubt was one of the headline-grabbing performances from Coachella 2024 across both weekends, marking the first time the group performed together since 2015. The quartet followed the Coachella bookings with a performance at the FireAid benefit concert at Los Angelesâ€™ Kia Forum earlier this January.
	

	The Sphere residency also marks the first time that a female-fronted act will headline the venue, as previous performers have included Dead & Co., U2, Eagles, Anyma and Backstreet Boys. It would be a return to the Strip for Stefani, who staged her own â€œJust a Girl: Las Vegasâ€ residency at the Zappos Theater in 2018. Those shows were set to conclude in May 2020, but eight were postponed due to the pandemic and rescheduled for the following year.

	As for any indication of new No Doubt music, the band hasnâ€™t signaled that theyâ€™ll head back to the studio to record the follow-up to their last album, 2012â€™s â€œPush and Shove.â€ During an interview with Nylon following their Coachella performances, Stefani said that sheâ€™s â€œopen to anything.â€ â€œWell, I donâ€™t have a crystal ball,â€ she said. â€œMost things have surprised me in life. One of the things Iâ€™ve learned is to be present in the moment and try to absorb whatâ€™s happening around me instead of looking ahead.â€

	Fans who previously registered for tickets have access to the new dates starting at 12 p.m. PT today. General tickets will be available starting on Oct. 17 at 10 a.m. PT on Ticketmaster.

schema.headline: No Doubt Adds Six Dates to 2026 Residency at Las Vegasâ€™ Sphere

title: Appleâ€™s Souped-Up Vision Pro AR/VR Headset Still Costs $3,500, but It May Be the Productâ€™s Last Upgrade for a While
description: In launching the Vision Pro headset last year, Apple touted it as the â€œultimate entertainment device,â€ essentially providing an immersive high-end h
body:
In launching the Vision Pro headset last year, Apple touted it as the â€œultimate entertainment device,â€ essentially providing an immersive high-end home theater you wear on your face. But at a list price of $3,500, the AR/VR â€œspatial computingâ€ product by all accounts has failed to live up the hype and hasnâ€™t sold a significant number of units.

	Undeterred, Apple has stuck to its road map â€” for now, at least. On Wednesday, it announced an upgraded version of the Vision Pro with its M5 processor, which â€œdelivers a leap forward in performance, improved display rendering, faster AI-powered workflows and extended battery life,â€ the company said. The headset still costs $3,499, which is significantly more than the $500 Meta Quest 3 mixed-reality headset.
	

	The Vision Pro M5 upgrade could be the last major rev on the headset for several years. Apple has postponed plans to make a lighter and less expensive version of Vision Pro, originally targeted for 2027 release, in favor of focusing on AI-enabled smart glasses to compete with Meta, according to a Bloomberg report earlier this month, citing an internal announcement. (Apple declined to comment on the report.)

	With the Vision Pro product upgrade, the tech giant is still hoping to make AR/VR experiences a bigger thing â€” and, Apple claims, the headset â€œremains the ultimate entertainment deviceâ€ with a screen â€œthat appears up to 100 feet wide.â€ 

	With the new model, users can experience immersive concerts with Amplium, and Vision Pro features natively developed apps for streaming services including HBO Max, Disney+ and Paramount+ (but not for Netflix or YouTube). The Apple TV app provides a large selection of 3D movies available to buy and view in Vision Pro, including recent hits like â€œSuperman,â€ â€œJurassic World Rebirth,â€ â€œHow to Train Your Dragonâ€ and â€œWicked.â€ New series and films on the Apple TV app available on Vision Pro include â€œMetallica,â€ â€œSubmerged,â€ â€œThe Weeknd: Open Heartsâ€ and â€œVIP: Yankee Stadium.â€
	

	Later this NBA season, users in the L.A. Lakersâ€™ broadcast territory will be able to watch select live games in Apple Immersive format on the Vision Pro, the company announced. Additionally, new titles from CNN, the Audi F1 Project, the BBC, HYBE and Red Bull will launch for the headset over the next few months. 

	Thanks to the M5 chip, Vision Pro can increase the video refresh rate up to 120Hz for â€œreduced motion blurâ€ when users look at their physical surroundings. In addition, according to Apple, the 16-core Neural Engine makes AI-powered features run up to 50% for system experiences (like transforming photos into spatial scenes) and up to twice as fast for third-party apps compared with the previous generation.

	Vision Pro â€” which is outfitted with 12 cameras, five sensors and six microphones â€” is able to stream new images to the displays within 12 milliseconds â€œto create a real-time view of the world.â€ The new battery now supports up to 2.5 hours of general use and up to 3 hours of video playback on a single charge.

	Other enhancements to the upgraded Vision Pro include a new dual-knit band (for â€œan even more comfortable fitâ€) and visionOS 26, which â€œunlocks innovative spatial experiences, including widgets, new Personas, an interactive Jupiter Environment, and new Apple Intelligence features with support for additional languages.â€

	For all Appleâ€™s efforts to try to make Vision Pro appealing to consumers, the product may ultimately see its most traction for business applications.

	In its announcement Wednesday, Apple called out CAE, which specializes in simulation and instruction solutions, as using Vision Pro to help pilots complete training activities outside of traditional flight-training centers. The company said Porsche is using the headsets to let drivers visualize and personalize new vehicles in select showrooms before taking delivery. Apple also cited Visage Imagingâ€™s 3D medical imaging app for Vision Pro, which is being used at hospitals like UC San Diego Health.

schema.headline: Appleâ€™s Souped-Up Vision Pro AR/VR Headset Still Costs $3,500, but It May Be the Productâ€™s Last Upgrade for a While

title: â€˜Big Rock Burningâ€™ Documentary, About Aftermath of Palisades Fire, Reveals Trailer and Streaming Date
description: A documentary about the aftermath of this yearâ€™s devastating L.A. wildfires â€” executive produced by Mark Hamill and Ricki Lake â€” has launched as the
body:
A documentary about the aftermath of this yearâ€™s devastating L.A. wildfires â€” executive produced by Mark Hamill and Ricki Lake â€” has launched as the film hit Vimeo on Wednesday.

	Directed by David Goldblum, a local to Big Rock who lost his home in the fire, â€œBig Rock Burningâ€ is a 30-minute film that tells the stories of residents impacted by the Pacific Palisades blazes and captures their process of rebuilding destroyed neighborhoods.
	

	Following the reported arrest of suspected arsonist Jonathan Rinderknecht, who authorities have accused of intentionally setting the spark, the filmmakers chose to bypass traditional distribution to release the film directly to audiences.


	â€œAlthough we were in ongoing conversations with various distributors, the timeline wasnâ€™t aligning with our hopes to make the film available as soon as possible,â€ Goldblum said in a statement. â€œWe never made the film to sit on it. People need closure, and we hope this release helps communities begin to heal. We are using this film to call for change.â€

	â€œBig Rock Burningâ€ has premiered at Malibu City Hall. Its festival run includes screenings at Mill Valley Film Festival, Santa Fe International Film Festival, Newport Beach Film Festival and SCAD Savannah Film Festival.Â 

	As part of the filmâ€™s ongoing impact campaign, Goldblum will be a part of a special session with the Council of Global Change at the United Nations Headquarters on Oct. 22 to use the film as a call to action. 

	The session, which includes the World Bank and Malala Fund, will be live on United Nations Web TV.Â 
	

	The filmmakers are dedicated to advocating for legislative reform around land management at the local and state levels.

	Ten percent of all proceeds from the film release will benefit the Boys & Girls Club of Malibuâ€™s Disaster Recovery Services, which is providing long-term, whole-person, trauma-informed care coordination and resources to Pacific Palisades fire survivors.Â 

	â€œBig Rock Burningâ€ is produced by Julie Parker Benello (â€œAmerican Factory,â€ â€œAthlete Aâ€) of Secret Sauce Media and James Costa (â€œThe Dating Game,â€ â€œWelcome to Chechnyaâ€) of Bird Street Productions, alongside Goldblum.

	Oscar-winning director Bryan Fogel also serve as executive producers alongside Marilou Hamill, Trevor Burgess, Judith Helfand, Oliver Blank and Meadow Fund.

	Check out the â€œBig Rock Burnâ€ trailer below:

schema.headline: â€˜Big Rock Burningâ€™ Documentary, About Aftermath of Palisades Fire, Reveals Trailer and Streaming Date

title: TMZ Streaming Live, Come Into Our Newsroom and Watch Things Happen!
description:
TMZ Live Stream
                          Come Into Our Office and Watch News Happen!!!
body:
TMZ Live Stream
                          Come Into Our Office and Watch News Happen!!!
                      
                  
                        Published October 15, 2025 9:38 AM PDT
                                                                      |
                Updated October 15, 2025 12:14 PM PDT
                                    
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          We want you to be a part of TMZ, so every weekday, between 9:30 AM and 11:30 AM PT, we take you inside our newsroom via live stream.
      
    
          You never know what you're gonna get ... a big story that breaks, an argument erupts in the room, or someone's just joking around.
      
    
          Your comments are a big part of the stream, and the staff spends a lot of time speaking directly to you. Every day is different!
      
    
          We also use our live stream to produce our "TMZ Live" TV show.

schema.headline: TMZ Streaming Live, Come Into Our Newsroom and Watch Things Happen!

title: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 2025, Behind the Scenes Pictures
description:
Victoriaâ€™s Secret Fashion Show
                          We're Backstage Bombshells Tooâ¤ï¸â€ğŸ”¥
body:
Victoriaâ€™s Secret Fashion Show
                          We're Backstage Bombshells Tooâ¤ï¸â€ğŸ”¥
                      
                  
                        Published October 15, 2025 12:41 PM PDT
                                                                            
      
    
          Think Victoriaâ€™s Secret Angels save the glam for the runway? Nope ... the show starts the moment they slide into the hair and makeup chair!
      
    
          Case in point -- these BTS moments are just a teaser for whatâ€™s coming when the Angels hit runway at NYCâ€™s flagship store at 7 PM ET ... with vets Alessandra Ambrosio, Irina Shayk, and Stella Maxwell already striking poses in robes and curlers.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          "Euphoria" star Barbie Ferreira is rocking the signature pink ... no nerves detected, just serving up a flirty pose.
      

          Angel Reese is making her VS Angel debut ... and she's already blessing the camera with a killer face card -- so just picture her in full lingerie, itâ€™s gonna be next-level fire!
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          Backstage is stacked -- with Emily Ratajkowski, Yasmin Wijnaldum, and Lila Moss in the mix ... all shaping up to make this one hell of a runway show!

title: Diddy's Special Conditions After Prison Release Revealed
body:
Diddy
                          Post-Prison Special Conditions Revealed ...
                          Outpatient Treatment for Drugs, D.V. Program
                      
                  
                        Published October 15, 2025 8:05 AM PDT
                                                                      |
                Updated October 15, 2025 12:04 PM PDT
                                    
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Diddy received a 50-month prison sentence just a couple weeks ago ... and we now know the special conditions he'll be facing when he gets out and begins his 5 years of supervised release -- they're chock full of continued treatment for his issues.
      
    
          The fallen mogul's special conditions of supervision were filed as part of the judgment in his criminal case Wednesday ... and, they include some pretty standard fare -- Diddy must submit to searches, and he can't contact the victims in this case for any reason.
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    TMZ.com
          
    
          Diddy will have to participate in outpatient treatment programs for drug abuse and mental health issues ... where he will be required to take prescribed medicine, unless a health care provider instructs him otherwise.
      

          The rapper must also participate in an approved program for domestic violence ... no surprise there -- everyone recalls the brutal Cassie beatdown caught on camera in a hotel hallway in L.A. in 2016.
      
    
          BTW ... among the standard conditions for release is a line about not owning, possessing or having access to a firearm or other destructive device.
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    TMZ.com
          
    
          Remember, Diddy's homes in Miami, L.A. and New York were searched and multiple firearms were recovered. Prosecutors said several of the weapons had scratched-off serial numbers.
      
    
          As you know ... Judge Arun Subramanian sentenced Diddy to 4 years and change in a federal prison after his conviction on two counts of violating the Mann Act. He was acquitted on the sex trafficking and racketeering charges.
      
    
          Diddy still hasn't been assigned to a prison ... though Judge Subramanian did say he thinks the mogul should serve his time as close as possible to the New York City Metropolitan area. Diddy's attorneys asked the court to recommend to the Bureau of Prisons that Diddy be shipped off to the low-security federal correctional institution FCI Fort Dix, in New Jersey.
      
    
          And, now at least Diddy knows what his life will look like when he gets out of the joint.

schema.headline: Diddy's Special Conditions After Prison Release Revealed

title: Ellen Greenberg's Parents Say They Want the Truth About Daughter's Death
description:
Ellen Greenberg
                          Parents Reject Medical Examiner's Suicide Ruling
body:
Ellen Greenberg
                          Parents Reject Medical Examiner's Suicide Ruling
                      
                  
                        Published October 15, 2025 9:43 AM PDT
                                                                      |
                Updated October 15, 2025 11:10 AM PDT
                                    
              
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    ABC News
          
    
          Ellen Greenberg's parents are demanding answers after a medical examiner reconfirmed their daughter died by suicide back in 2011 ... claiming the M.E. doesn't know a thing about Ellen's mental state at the time.
      
    
          Sandee and Josh Greenberg sat for an interview with ABC News Wednesday ... and, they told the outlet they still aren't convinced of Ellen's official cause of death.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Sandee claims from a "clinical view" there's no evidence Ellen took her own life ... questioning the medical examiner's credibility when it comes to pointing to Ellen's mental health state at the time ... since the M.E. didn't actually know her.
      

          The Greenbergs finish off the interview by saying they don't know what their future options are ... but, they don't plan on going away quietly after the M.E.'s ruling.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          As we told you ... Greenberg, a 27-year-old Philadelphia teacher, was found dead by her fiancÃ© in 2011 ... she had 20 stab wounds in the back of her neck and head, and a knife sticking out of her chest.
      
    
          The Philadelphia Medical Examiner's office initially ruled the death a homicide ... before changing the determination to suicide after meeting with the Philadelphia Police Department.
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    TMZ.com
          
    
          Greenberg's family pressured local officials to reopen the case in 2025 ... but, the M.E. confirmed the suicide determination -- closing it once again.
      
    
          Chief Medical Examiner Dr. Lindsay Simon released a 32-page report last week which concludes ... "while the distribution of injuries is admittedly unusual, the fact remains that Ellen would be capable of inflicting these injuries herself."
      
    
          Joseph Podraza Jr., the Greenberg family attorney, blasted the review calling it "deeply flawed attempt to justify a predetermined conclusion."
      
    
          If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, help is available. Call or text 988 or chat 988lifeline.org.

schema.headline: Ellen Greenberg's Parents Say They Want the Truth About Daughter's Death

title: Kylie Jenner Dons Latex Cutout Dress, Warns 'Careful What You Wish For'
description:
Kylie Jenner
                          Bursting Out of Cutout Latex Dress
body:
Kylie Jenner
                          Bursting Out of Cutout Latex Dress
                          ... Cryptic Caption Cautions 'Careful What You Wish For'
                      
                  
                        Published October 15, 2025 8:30 AM PDT
                                                                      |
                Updated October 15, 2025 10:05 AM PDT
                                    
      
    
      
        
              
    
    
          You wanted it? You got it! Kylie Jenner is putting us all on notice with a revealing dress and seductive makeup ... in hot new pics!
      
    
          Kylie posted on Instagram, "Careful what you wish for" on Wednesday, along with a crown emoji. In the pic, she's wearing a black, cutout latex dress and what appears to be makeup from her King Kylie Collection, launching October 18.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          This comes after the mogul dropped a new single, "Fourth Strike," as promotion for her cosmetics launch.
      

          The breathy song on her official YouTube page features her sultry yet crisp vocals as she croons ... "One strike, two strike, let me get the mood right ... Do it on purpose just to see how it ends." She closes out her verse by whispering, "King Kylie."
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          As you know, Kylie built an empire on bold colors, wild hair, and makeup that popped a decade ago -- and trust us, the full collection will no doubt serve that same fierce energy.
      
    
          Long live the king!
